comments.text: The issue with the W3C is still open.  The current spec involves entry globals, which Domenic is trying to minimize the use of, so there is a very good chance the spec will change.  It's certainly not worth working on matching the spec without talking to Domenic first.  See in particular https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/1431 which explicitly lists the security checks in question as problematic.
